description: The diagram being exchanged.  The coordinate system is a standard Cartesian coordinate system and the orientation attribute defines the orientation.

contents.name: DiagramStyle
contents.description: A Diagram may have a DiagramStyle.

contents.name: orientation
contents.description: Coordinate system orientation of the diagram.

enumValues.name: negative
enumValues.description: For 2D diagrams, a negative orientation gives the left-hand orientation (favoured by computer graphics displays) with X values increasing from left to right and Y values increasing from top to bottom.   This is also known as a left hand orientation.

contents.name: x1InitialView
contents.description: X coordinate of the first corner of the initial view.

contents.name: x2InitialView
contents.description: X coordinate of the second corner of the initial view.

contents.name: y1InitialView
contents.description: Y coordinate of the first corner of the initial view.

contents.name: y2InitialView
contents.description: Y coordinate of the second corner of the initial view.
